tool_description: A simple meme generator that generates memes by choosing a preloaded images, and short top and bottom text sentences. Memes are served in the JPEG image file format.
name: Meme Generator
title: Meme Generator

api_list.name: uploadFont
api_list.description: Upload a new font and add it to the list of available fonts.

api_list.name: uploadImage
api_list.description: Upload a new meme image and add it to the list of available images.
